rows.label: qev050901_MSG0001
rows.name: Please leave me be. I am in no mood for company.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Is there something on my mind? Yes, obviously.
Day-to-day life presents us all with a few hundred
worries to fret over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0003
rows.name:
...You say that's too many? Preposterous.
If you include the little things, everyone should have
at least that many.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0004
rows.name:
Though in my case, I have no time to spare on little
things when the big ones loom before me like a vast,
insurmountable wall.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0005
rows.name:
But perhaps there is some meaning to us meeting here.
Will you do me a favor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0006
rows.name: I need a knife. Will you procure one for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0007
rows.name:
Any cheap thing will do, but it is absolutely necessary
if I am to find success in the coming days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0008
rows.name:
And yes, I know that I could buy a knife from one
of the arms manufacturers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0009
rows.name: Except...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0010
rows.name:
Except that I cannot make sense of your human
shopping terminal, and could not hope to complete
even the simplest of transactions with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0011
rows.name: You are my last hope, human. Please![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev050901_SEL0011
rows.name: Agree to bring Gu Ladha a knife.

rows.label: qev050901_JNK0020
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev050901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Gu Ladha if she would not rather have a gun.

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0012
rows.name:
I am sorry to ask—not to mention humiliated for
relying on a total stranger like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0013
rows.name:
I have always been terrible at things like shopping or
finding locations based on directions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0014
rows.name: A gun? Never! No, no, no. It's far too painful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0015
rows.name:
Just think of how it must feel to be shot with one of
those! Far worse than a little cut from a knife,
no doubt. And the noise![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0016
rows.name:
Suffice it to say that I have no love of guns.
A simple knife is all I require, if it please you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0017
rows.name: I shall wait here. Indefinitely, if needs be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0018
rows.name: I rather like this place. It is quiet and...peaceful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0019
rows.name: In any case, I thank you for your help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0020
rows.name:
I find this place quite comfortable—hardly anyone ever
comes here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0021
rows.name:
Thinking on it now, our chance meeting here seems
against all odds. A tiny miracle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0022
rows.name:
I am mortified to waste such a fated meeting requesting
so meager a favor, but such is life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0023
rows.name: I appreciate you finding me a knife just the same.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0024
rows.name: Ah, you return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0025
rows.name:
I was just stewing in my shame at the presumption of
asking for help in such a personal matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0026
rows.name: ...Have you the knife, perchance?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0027
rows.name: Many thanks. I apologize again for the trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0028
rows.name: Now I can finally begin what I set out to do...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0029
rows.name: It is time... Time for my ears to come off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_JNK0030
rows.name: Restrain

rows.label: qev050901_SEL0031
rows.name: Grab Gu Ladha's knife hand and hold it in place.

rows.label: qev050901_JNK0040
rows.name: Shout

rows.label: qev050901_SEL0041
rows.name: Scream at Gu Ladha to stop.

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0030
rows.name: ...Hrm?! No! Wh-what are you doing?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0031
rows.name:
Why are you interfering? This is my business,
and my mind is set![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0032
rows.name: Ow! Ow ow OW! All right! Enough![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0033
rows.name:
Honestly, did you have to use force?
It seems a little extreme...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0034
rows.name:
But very well. I shall put down the knife.
Just...let go of me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0035
rows.name: There is nothing you can say to dissuade me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0036
rows.name: My mind is set! My resolve firm as any rock![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0037
rows.name: ...No one understands how I feel anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0038
rows.name:
I will cut these damnable ears from my head and be
reborn a woman to respect![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0039
rows.name:
These ears—these cute, round, fluffy ears—have plagued
me all my life. Damn the both of them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0040
rows.name:
My kinsfolk mocked me for them relentlessly,
and fear of anyone seeing them gradually drove me
to reclusion. Lately, I am unable to face anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0041
rows.name:
Even on the field of battle, where the measure of a
Wrothian is taken, I was ever distracted by thoughts of
others seeing my ears.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0042
rows.name:
Unable to train with others, my skills as a warrior have
been in steady decline.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0043
rows.name:
They are more stigma than skin, human...
These ears are shackles that bind me fast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_JNK0050
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev050901_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that being a warrior is not the only way to live.

rows.label: qev050901_JNK0060
rows.name: Train

rows.label: qev050901_SEL0061
rows.name: Offer to give Gu Ladha special training.

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0044
rows.name: Not the only way to live...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0045
rows.name:
Wrothians live only for glory. To fight and win and die
honorably in battle. But you say another way exists?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0046
rows.name:
Though it is true that because of these ears,
earning glory and honor has never been a large
concern of mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0047
rows.name:
I do wish to be of help to my people, but if you say
there are ways to do that besides waging war,
I would be eager to hear more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_JNK0070
rows.name: Suggest Support

rows.label: qev050901_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Gu Ladha to try taking on a support role.

rows.label: qev050901_JNK0080
rows.name: Suggest PR

rows.label: qev050901_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Gu Ladha to try her hand at public relations work.

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0048
rows.name:
Support? Such as tending to the wounded and cookery
and...so forth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0049
rows.name: Important work, to be sure, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0050
rows.name: Well, not to boast, but my cooking is legendarily bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0051
rows.name:
I fear that if I manned the camp mess,
effects on morale would be anything but positive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: NewText_99
rows.name: Public...relations?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0052
rows.name: Giving speeches on street corners and the like?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0053
rows.name:
I suppose that sort of thing may play an important role
in fostering good relations between our various races.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0054
rows.name:
But... Well, not to brag, but my shyness is nothing
short of legendary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0055
rows.name: I fear I would do more harm to the cause than good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0056
rows.name: Hmm, but wait. What about a liaison?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0057
rows.name:
I seem to have success in my dealings with humans.
Human women, especially, seem drawn to me.
Or to my ears, to be precise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0058
rows.name:
Yes... It seems so simple now! If I put my mind to
using this trait instead of running from it, a world
of new possibilities may open up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0059
rows.name: It's certainly worth a try.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0060
rows.name:
I shall begin by requesting to my commander that I be
appointed as a Wrothian-human liaison![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0061
rows.name:
It pains me to trouble you further, but could I ask you
to accompany me? Just to vouch for my qualifications?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0062
rows.name:
I feel confident that your opinion as a human will be
enough to win him over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0063
rows.name: Special training?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0064
rows.name:
Yes, I suppose I have allowed my...anxieties over my
ears to overwhelm me. I have grown meek.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0065
rows.name:
It might do me good to forget all of that and lose
myself in training.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0066
rows.name:
Very well. If it is not too much of an imposition,
I will take you up on your generous offer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0067
rows.name:
I shall make my preparations and meet you outside of
the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0068
rows.name: I ask that you join me there once you are ready.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0069
rows.name:
I have made up my mind. If I am to do this, I will do it
right. A thorough retraining from the foundation up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050901_MSG0070
rows.name: I will see you outside. Farewell![ST:wait ]
